channel.title: Why wouldn't it work anymore?!
channel.description: Hey guys, today i've downloaded 667 server and i ran it for first time and well it worked well with hamachi it connects perfectly to the client as i putted the hamachi's ip in the client and complie then hell yesh it worked, so yeah but when i gave the client to my friend and server is running! he actually went in like for 10 seconds and he kept disconnecting then after he closed the client he tried again but his client won't load while the server is working perfectly with my pc and my client too and i can enter the server normally and oh yeah i tried this on 718 and other servers but now it won't all of sudden ? Like wtf? something blocking maybe? please help me and sorry for bad english :(

item.title: Why wouldn't it work anymore?!
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

You need to explain the matter in a more detailed way, your friend can’t what? He can’t get on? If so, what error does he get? What is he using to access your server? Maybe Firewall, Maybe port? Maybe Anti-virus/Internet Security… It could be many things, but if you could explain a lil more, I might be able to help you.

Read full topic
